alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 27 at 3:57AM PST until November 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 19 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...May see light ice amounting to a thin glaze between 2500-3000 ft in elevation during the early morning hours on Sunday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
